shops.text3: Do you have any questions? Ask us on social media!

Доставка товаров из Великобритании в Рос: Delivery of goods from the UK to Russia
Начните экономить до 80% на шопинге. Рег: Start saving up to 80% on shopping. Sign up with OkeyPost to buy discounted UK clothing, shoes, gadgets from famous brands and ship securely to Russia.
Насколько выгодно покупать?: How profitable is it to buy?
Доставка одежды из Великобритании от: Delivery of clothes from the UK from
Поручите нашим мастерам шопинга оформить: Let our shopper place your orders in UK stores and free up time for more important things.
Такой способ покупки также подойдёт, есл: This method of purchase is also suitable if the store only accepts English cards.
OkeyPost удобная и быстрая доставка посы: Okey Post convenient and fast delivery of parcels from the UK
Рассчитайте стоимость доставки из Англии: Calculate the cost of shipping from England to your home. We will receive your parcels in the warehouse, if necessary, we will combine several deliveries into one and send them to you securely packaged.
4 простых шага для ваших покупок в Велик: 4 easy steps for your purchases in the UK
в английском магазине, оплачиваете и ука: in an English store, pay and indicate the address of the OkeyPost warehouse
и появляются в вашем личном кабинете на: and appear in your personal account on our website
в надежной упаковке, по выгодной цене и: in safe packaging, at a bargain price and very quickly
в пункте выдачи, на почте или с курьером: at the point of issue, by post or by courier
Не хотите разбираться самостоятельно, на: If you don't want to deal with it yourself, our shopper will be happy to buy all the goods for you.
Виртуальный тур по нашему складу в реаль: Live virtual tour of our warehouse
Вы можете всегда посмотреть на нашу слаж: You can always look at our well-coordinated work in the warehouse
120 000 довольных клиентов в России уже: 120,000 satisfied customers in Russia have already made their choice
За последний год десятки тысяч наших кли: Over the past year, tens of thousands of our customers have ordered goods from England and left 19,633 reviews
Посылка обрабатывается не дольше 48 часо: The parcel is processed no longer than 48 hours after receipt at the warehouse.
Отслеживайте весь процесс с помощью sms-: Track the whole process with SMS notifications.
Ваша доставка самая быстрая и дешёвая!!!: Your delivery is the fastest and cheapest!!!
Пуховик Levi’s c eBay. Всё приехало быст: Levi's down jacket from eBay. Everything arrived quickly and whole..
Огонь, как всегда! Отдельное спасибо за: Fire, as always! Special thanks for the additional packaging, the Apple watch came in a simple paper bag)
Очень быстро, надежно! Как всегда большо: Very fast, reliable! As always, thanks a lot for your work!
С нами вы получаете целых два адреса в U: With us you get as many as two addresses in the UK! We have two warehouses for receiving parcels - in London and Manchester. Indicate in the store one of them, sending to which will be cheaper (or the purchase will be tax-free). Most often in London, our customers order clothes and shoes, while in Manchester they order gadgets and everything else. With OkeyPost you always get the maximum benefit! When shipping from the UK to Russia, all your goods must be insured. Reception of parcels at our warehouse, their processing, removal of extra boxes, storage for up to 70 days is completely free of charge. We also combine parcels from different stores into one for free. This is necessary to reduce the cost of delivering parcels from the UK to Russia. We have the best shipping! From $11.99 per package! And if you have any special requirements, such as checking the technique or additional film for the most fragile goods, our warehouse operators will be happy to fulfill them on special request. Okeypost.com is reliable, fast and profitable. And in our social networks you will always find information about the best discounts fyukbqcrb[ stores. You don't have to go on Black Friday or Prime Day, cool promotions take place every day!
Подпишитеть и будьте в курсе всех скидок: Подпишитеть и будьте в курсе всех скидок и акций магазинов Великобритании!
